text:
Skills:
- Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript, Solidity, C++, HTML, CSS, SQL
- Technologies: React.js, Node.js, React Native, Flask, AWS, Databases, Git, QLoRa, Langchain, APIs, Pandas, NumPy

Experience:
- Position: Data Science Intern
- Company: BASF Corporation
- Location: Durham, North Carolina
- Dates: May 2024 – Aug 2024
- Employment Type: Internship
- Responsibilities:
  • Engineered a custom Python web scraper using BeautifulSoup, Pandas, and NumPy to extract and preprocess over 150,000 agricultural blog posts into a data pipeline.
  • Deployed Langchain Azure Search embedding and retrieval models, using prompt engineering and a vector database with custom JSON chunking for efficient data retrieval and insight generation.
  • Boosted marketing campaign reach by 14% and reduced manual social media uptime by 90% by creating an interactive PowerBI dashboard to display raw data and GenAI processed insights.
  • Presented project to executive suite and global leadership stakeholders, effectively communicating technical aspects and development process.

- Dates: Oct 2023 – Present
- Employment Type: Full-Time
- Responsibilities:
  • Researching and authoring a whitepaper for a new Proof of Sampling (PoSP) consensus model for Hyperbolic Labs, which optimizes arbitration using decentralized orchestrators and the EigenLayer restaking protocol.

text:
Projects:
- Project Name: AI Study Tool
- GitHub: [Link](#)
- Description:
  • Engineered an AI web app using HuggingFace models with Quantized Low-Rank Adaptation (QLoRA) fine-tuning to convert and summarize PDFs/images of schoolwork into audio files, pulling key insights to simplify students’ workload.
  • Built a React.js frontend and Flask backend, hosted on AWS.
  • Integrated Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for text extraction, TTS for audio generation, and Stripe API for billing.
